guilt_inducing_design.description: Apps make users feel bad about spending

github_repos.name: Ka4aH4uk/expense-tracker-app
github_repos.description: Expense Tracker - your reliable app for tracking expenses and income that will help you monitor your finances and effectively manage your budget.

github_repos.name: Maleaha/iwf-wireframe
github_repos.description: Low-fidelity interactive wireframe prototype for a mobile-first financial planning app tailored to women in Pakistan. Built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and screen-based navigation for onboarding, budgeting, investment, and goal tracking.

github_repos.name: Sandarukaushan999/Valuty-kotlin-project-
github_repos.description: Personal finance app allowing users to track income/expenses with charts, backup/restore data, and PIN-based authentication. Includes budgeting, export/import data, and currency selection  Features: Pie charts, category management, onboarding, input validation, notification alerts

recommended_solutions.name: Ka4aH4uk/expense-tracker-app
recommended_solutions.description: Expense Tracker - your reliable app for tracking expenses and income that will help you monitor your finances and effectively manage your budget.

github_repos.name: Ratna-code/Directing-Customers-to-Subscription-Through-Financial-App-Behavior-Analysis-ML-Project
github_repos.description: ML project analyzing customer behavior to optimize freemium conversion strategies for financial apps. Shows how to offer premium features selectively to interested but price-sensitive customers.

github_repos.name: innovate-maci-mochi/whats-for-dinner-v1
github_repos.description: Under construction! This app is being designed to help users find affordable, easy-to-make recipes for meal prepping on a budget. Whether you're trying to save time, money, or both, this tool provides curated recipes that meet your financial goals while making meal planning stress-free.

github_repos.name: hannahgsimon/Fraudulent-Activity-Notifications
github_repos.description: The program simulates a bank alert system that notifies clients when their spending on a given day is at least twice the median of spending over a trailing number of days.
